===========================================================================
Advanced engine needed  : ZDoom
Primary purpose         : Single play
===========================================================================
Title                   : Adessa
Filename                : ADESSA.WAD
Release date            : 18/06/03
Author                  : Mouse
Email Address           : lilwhitemo@midmaine.com

Description             : The bioship Adessa has become infected with
                          Leviathons, and is stranded in subspace. You must
                          cleanse the ship before it to is turned into a
                          Leviathon.

                          My monsters didn't work with the map so I cancled
                          the project.

Additional Credits to   : H.R. Giger
                          Rick Clark for the biotex texture pack
===========================================================================
* What is included *
New levels              : 3
Sounds                  : Yes
Music                   : No
Graphics                : Yes
Dehacked/BEX Patch      : No
Demos                   : No
Other                   : No

* Play Information *
Game                    : DOOM2
Map #                   : Map01 - Map03
Single Player           : Designed for
Cooperative 2-4 Player  : No
Deathmatch 2-4 Player   : No
Other game styles       : None
Difficulty Settings     : Not implemented

* Construction *
Base                    : New from scratch
Build Time              : A week?
Editor(s) used          : XWE, ZETH
Known Bugs              : None
May Not Run With...     : Older versions of ZDoom
